text.invalid_genie.furnace_replace: <Invalid genie> This furnace will speed up the smelting!
text.invalid_genie.water_replace: <Invalid genie> It's difficult to walk in water...
text.invalid_genie.nether_gold: <Invalid genie> Gold? Here's piglins for trading!
text.invalid_genie.bee_nest: <Invalid genie> Hey, it's a bee nest! There's tasty honey!
text.invalid_genie.armor_ench: <Invalid genie> The armor won't be that strong without enchantments...
text.invalid_genie.remove_fire: <Invalid genie> Oh no! Someone is burning!
text.invalid_genie.anger_ender: <Invalid genie> The endermans are too far... Now they will go to you!
text.invalid_genie.remove_effects: <Invalid genie> The harmful effects are too harmful...
text.invalid_genie.add_hunger: <Invalid genie> Oh no! You have hunger! Now I'll help!
